basics.name: Aljaed Lui Ereno
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2020. I would like to use my knowledge in the world of data analysis, front-end development and/or machine learning.

work.summary: Maintain and develop sites for Manoa now.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa

work.company: UH College of Tropical Agriculture and Human Resources
highlights: Handled payments pertaining to CTAHR merch and forms
Helped out with events and conferences

volunteer.summary: As a student volunteer we are expected to help out anyone with questions, clean, reshelve and reorganize books, help out with events and promote happiness through reading.
highlights: Helped out in various arts and crafts and month specific events

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Donald K. Scholarships
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded for students pursuing an engineering degree in University of Hawaii at Manoa.

awards.title: EE Black Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded for students pursuing an engineering degree at University of Hawaii at Manoa, 3.0 gpa and essay.
